channel.title: Allstar Server Nulling Problems! Help please
channel.description:
Hey im using allstarscape I added an anti-null that i ripped from delta and it rejects the ip (even says so in command prompt) and in ::players no nulls show up but it makes my server go "error connecting to server" even though I can login on 127.0.0.1 but I cant even login with my original ip allstarscape.no-ip.org
here's what i mean: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/chzc7.jpg[/img]
What kind of nuller is this person using?
How do i stop it?
I tried adding grahams thread per client so many times i dont get compile errors but when i login i cant walk or anything and i just Disconnect after a while. So i can load the proper loadgame functions it wont work for me
Im not expecting a spoodfeed but i really need one right now as im not a good java programmer!
ALSO:
what type of anti nuller is good for a complete block, arraylist, single thread(wich i can't do grahams tut), hashmap, etc?

item.title: Allstar Server Nulling Problems! Help please
item.dc:creator: @weeddamn weeddamn
